thread.section_title: MAXBACK Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of MAXBACK | www.maxback.com
thread.title: Lisa

author: Lisa
title: Lisa
text: I was looking to trade in my Fitbit Surge health watch, and most companies were offering $5 or less for a trade in credit. I luckily happened upon Macback's site online, and not only did they offer the largest trade in credit, but they also provided a return shipping label. All i had to do was box up my product and mail it off. Within 2 or 3 days, the money was posted to my Paypal account. Painless, quick and easy! I will definitely use Maxback anytime I need to trade in any electronics.
